for t in xrange(int(raw_input())):
	a = raw_input()
	b = raw_input()
	l = len(a)
	t1 = 0
	t0 = 0
	c1 = 0
	c0 = 0
	for i in range(l):
		# counting total 0/1 in a
		if (a[i]=='1'):
			t1 += 1
		else:
			t0 += 1
		# counting unmatched 0/1 in a	
		if (a[i]!=b[i]):
			if (a[i]=='1'):
				c1 += 1
			else:
				c0 += 1
	# both are same
	if (c0 == 0 and c1 == 0):
		print "Lucky Chef"
		print 0
	# all 1 to 0
	elif (c0 == 0):
		if (t0 == 0):
			print "Unlucky Chef"
		else:
			print "Lucky Chef"
			print c1
	elif (c1 == 0):
		if (t1 == 0):
			print "Unlucky Chef"
		else:
			print "Lucky Chef"
			print c0
	elif (t1 == 0 or t0 == 0):
		print "Unlucky Chef"
	else:
		print "Lucky Chef"
		print max(c1,c0)
